docsKeyValue.customCondition: if():[__.vat='Yes']:[search():[collection=account;field:[ledgerAccount=mainReceivedData:().customerAccount]]:[if():[_.data.value()]:[if():[_.data.value().vatLedgerAccount]:[search():[collection=account;field:[ledgerAccount=_.data.value().vatLedgerAccount]]:[if():[_.data.value()]:[().indexAsDoc=[account=_.data.value().id;ledgerAccount=__.data.value().vatLedgerAccount]]:[send():[success=false;msg='VAT Account does not exist!']]]:[send():[success=false;msg='Customer does not have a vat account!']]]:[success=false;msg='Customer does not have a VAT account!']]]:[send():[success=false;msg='Customer account does not exist!']]]:[().setDoc=false];#kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk

if():[__.vat='Yes']:[if():[mainReceivedData:().supplier='Yes';mainReceivedData:().supplierAccountb]:[search():[collection=account;field:[ledgerAccount=mainReceivedData:().supplierAccountb]]:[if():[_.data.value()]:[if():[_.data.value().vatLedgerAccount]:[search():[collection=account;field:[ledgerAccount=_.data.value().vatLedgerAccount]]:[if():[_.data.value()]:[().indexAsDoc=[account=_.data.value().id;ledgerAccount=__.data.value().vatLedgerAccount]]:[send():[success=false;msg='VAT Account does not exist!']]]]:[send():[success=false;msg='Supplier does not have a vat account!']]]:[send():[success=false;msg='Supplier account does not exist!']]]]:[search():[collection=account;field:[ledgerAccount='442/1/1']]:[if():[_.data.value()]:[().indexAsDoc=[account=_.data.value().id;ledgerAccount='442/1/1']]:[send():[success=false;msg='VAT Account does not exist!']]]]]:[().setDoc=false];#kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk

expenseVoucher.customCondition: if():[_.data.payNow='Yes'||_.data.supplier='No']:[_.data.payments._():[().totalCredits+=_.amount];_.data.expenses._():[().totalDebits+=_.totalAmount];if():[().totalCredits!=().totalDebits]:[send():[success=false;msg='Total expenses must match total payments for accurate processing!']]]

paymentVoucher.customCondition: _.data.from._():[().totalCredits+=[[_.amount]-[_.chargesAmount||0]]];_.data.to._():[().totalDebits+=_.amount];if():[().totalCredits!=().totalDebits]:[send():[success=false;msg='Total credit must match total debit for accurate processing!']]
